titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide student loan deferment for victims of terrorist attacks.
Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act
This bill allows a borrower who is a victim of a terrorist attack to defer payment of federal student loans for up to one year.
